channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Axios: Worst Part About Gruesome N.C. Train Stabbing Is People Noticing
item.description: 'MAGA influencers are drawing repeated attention to violent attacks to elevate the issue of urban crime.'

item.title: The energy department said wind and solar capacity is ‘worthless’ without sunlight or wind. Elon Musk reminds DoE about batteries: ‘Um… hello?’
item.description: Musk touted a massive energy storage project in Australia designed to stabilize the grid and expand renewable use.

item.title: Russia Is Not a Defender of Christianity
item.description: The Russian regime is actively persecuting Christians, in Russia itself and in Russian-occupied parts of Ukraine.

item.title: Rand Paul Compared Trump Cartel Strike To Lynching, Backed Obama Droning Americans
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul harshly criticized a Trump administration strike on a Venezuelan cartel, but supported Obama's drone strike of Americans.

item.title: Watch Norah O’Donnell’s Justice Barrett ‘Interview’ To Understand How The Media Lie
item.description: From beginning to end, O'Donnell treated her 'interview' with Justice Barrett as an opportunity to try and discredit the Supreme Court.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s planned report linking Tylenol to autism crashes shares of parent company Kenvue
item.description: RFK Jr. is preparing a report that will allegedly claim a link between prenatal Tylenol (acetaminophen) use and autism.

item.title: DC Would Get Much Better If More Politicians Threatened Punches Like Scott Bessent
item.description: Sometimes solving problems requires the men running the country to put their money and meat hooks where their mouths are.

item.title: The one-time ‘Oracle of Wall Street’ who called the 2008 crash sounds the alarm for Gen Z and Millennials in the year ahead
